sentences.en: But reviewers complain this work is too mystierious and esoteric.
sentences.cn: 但是对文本特征的把握不够使得此书长期以来像天书一般无解.

sentences.en: Cale has ploughed a more esoteric furrow as a recording artist.
sentences.cn: 作为一名录音艺人，凯尔走了一条较为冷僻的道路。

sentences.en: Esoteric tradition became handed down in spiritual groups, communes, or fraternities.
sentences.cn: 深奥的传统在精神团体 、 公社或兄弟会中代代相传.

sentences.en: Eventual consistency is not some esoteric property of extreme distributed systems.
sentences.cn: 最终一致性不是那些被过度分布的系统中存在的晦涩难懂的属性.

sentences.en: How we regulate insurance is not an esoteric issue.
sentences.cn: 我们如何监管保险业并不是个深奥的问题.

sentences.en: I asked, but he said he couldn't tell me the recipe because it was esoteric.
sentences.cn: 我问了, 但是他说他不能告诉我那药方,因为那是秘传的.

sentences.en: Kinda esoteric and very, very bright.
sentences.cn: 有点深不可测而且非常, 非常聪明.

sentences.en: Of course, not everyone can understand it, since we often employ a symbolic or esoteric language.
sentences.cn: 当然, 不是人人都能领会的, 因为我们常常用一些象征性或深奥的语言.

sentences.en: Some words are really too esoteric for this dictionary.
sentences.cn: 有些单词实在太生僻了,未收入本词典内.

sentences.en: The esoteric tradition had less to fear now.
sentences.cn: 秘密传统现在不再需要害怕.

sentences.en: the esoteric world of scientific supercomputing
sentences.cn: 深奥的科学超级计算领域

sentences.en: There are indications that his esoteric popularity may be ebbing.
sentences.cn: 有迹象表明,他神秘的声望可能正在下降.

sentences.en: This was House of Commons gossip, as esoteric as theatre - gossip.
sentences.cn: 这叫做众议院的流言蜚语, 它同戏剧界的流言蜚语一样是高深莫测的.

sentences.en: This would seem to an esoteric subject, but it is not.
sentences.cn: 这有点像深奥的主题, 但并不是的.

sentences.en: Through exoteric and esoteric sources, we know that the Nazarene Master fulfilled his spiritual mission successfully.
sentences.cn: 通过开放和深奥的来源, 我们知道,拿撒勒硕士履行他的精神使命成功.

sentences.en: What gives international finance its esoteric twist is the existence of national moneys.
sentences.cn: 使国际金融具有其奥妙曲折的特点的原因是由于存在着各国货币.

words.tran_cn: 秘传的；限于圈内人的；难懂的

trans.tran_cn: 秘传的，机密的，难解的，深奥的，限于少数人的
trans.tran_en: known and understood by only a few people who have special knowledge about something
